column1: During your life, on how many days have you had at least one drink of alcohol?
column2: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you have at least one drink of alcohol?
column3: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you have {'4' Female, '5' Male - DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks of alcohol in a row, that is, within a couple of hours?
column4: How old were you when you had your first drink of alcohol, other than a few sips?
column6: The next questions are about drinking alcoholic beverages. Included are liquor (such as whiskey or gin), beer, wine, wine coolers, and any other type of alcoholic beverage. In {your/SP's} entire life, {have you/has he/has she} had at least 1 drink of any kind of alcohol, not counting small tastes or sips? By a drink, I mean a 12 oz. beer, a 5 oz. glass of wine, or one and a half ounces of liquor.
column7: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} drink any type of alcoholic beverage? PROBE: How many days per week, per month, or per year did {you/SP} drink?
column8: During the past 12 months, on those days that {you/SP} drank alcoholic beverages, on the average, how many drinks did {you/he/she} have? By a drink, I mean a 12 oz. beer, a 5 oz. glass of wine, or one and a half ounces of liquor.)
column9: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks of any alcoholic beverage? PROBE: How many days per week, per month, or per year did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks in a single day?
column10: Was there ever a time or times in {your/SP's} life when {you/he/she} drank {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks of any kind of alcoholic beverage almost every day?
column11: Considering all types of alcoholic beverages, during the past 30 days, how many times did you have {5/4} or more drinks on an occasion?
column12: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have {DISPLAY NUMBER} or more drinks in a period of two hours or less?
column13: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have 8 or more drinks in a single day?
column14: During the past 12 months, about how often did {you/SP} have 12 or more drinks in a single day?
column16: Which of the following drugs have you injected using a needle?
column17: The following questions ask about use of drugs not prescribed by a doctor. Please remember that your answers to these questions are strictly confidential. The first questions are about marijuana and hashish. Marijuana is also called pot or grass. Marijuana is usually smoked, either in cigarettes, called joints, or in a pipe. It is sometimes cooked in food. Hashish is a form of marijuana that is also called 'hash.' It is usually smoked in a pipe. Another form of hashish is hash oil. Have you ever, even once, used marijuana or hashish?
column18: How old were you the first time you used marijuana or hashish?
column19: Have you ever smoked marijuana or hashish at least once a month for more than one year?
column20: How old were you when you started smoking marijuana or hashish at least once a month for one year?
column21: How long has it been since you last smoked marijuana or hashish at least once a month for one year?
column22: How long has it been since you last smoked marijuana or hashish at least once a month for one year?
column23: During the time that you smoked marijuana or hashish, how often would you usually use it?
column24: During the time that you smoked marijuana or hashish, how many joints or pipes would you usually smoke in a day?
column25: How long has it been since you last used marijuana or hashish?
column26: How long has it been since you last used marijuana or hashish?
column27: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use marijuana or hashish?
column28: Have you ever used cocaine, crack cocaine, heroin, or methamphetamine?
column29: The following questions are about cocaine, including all the different forms of cocaine such as powder, 'crack', 'free base', and coca paste. Have you ever, even once, used cocaine, in any form?
column30: How old were you the first time you used cocaine, in any form?
column31: How long has it been since you last used cocaine, in any form?
column32: How long has it been since you last used cocaine, in any form?
column33: During your life, altogether how many times have you used cocaine, in any form?
column34: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use cocaine, in any form?
column35: The following questions are about heroin. Have you ever, even once, used heroin?
column36: How old were you the first time you used heroin?
column37: How long has it been since you last used heroin?
column38: How long has it been since you last used heroin?
column39: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use heroin?
column40: The following questions are about methamphetamine, also known as crank, crystal, ice or speed. Have you ever, even once, used methamphetamine?
column41: How old were you the first time you used methamphetamine?
column42: How long has it been since you last used methamphetamine?
column43: How long has it been since you last used methamphetamine?
column44: During your life, altogether how many times have you used methamphetamine?
column45: During the past 30 days, on how many days did you use methamphetamine?
column46: The following questions are about the different ways that certain drugs can be used. Have you ever, even once, used a needle to inject a drug not prescribed by a doctor?
column47: Which of the following drugs have you injected using a needle?
column48: Which of the following drugs have you injected using a needle?
column49: Which of the following drugs have you injected using a needle?
column50: How old were you when you first used a needle to inject any drug not prescribed by a doctor?
column51: How long ago has it been since you last used a needle to inject a drug not prescribed by a doctor?
column52: How long ago has it been since you last used a needle to inject a drug not prescribed by a doctor?
column53: During your life, altogether how many times have you injected drugs not prescribed by a doctor?
column54: Think about the period of your life when you injected drugs the most often. How often did you inject then?
column55: Have you ever been in a drug treatment or drug rehabilitation program?
